abstract: Cryptocurrency start-up known as the Decentralized Autonomous Organization has attracted $152 million in investments since April, making it most successful crowdfunded venture ever; venture is of questionable legality but comes amid growing vogue for virtual currencies, like Bitcoin; DAO investors will decide collectively where to invest currency, called Ether.
lead_paragraph: This collective digital-currency start-up runs head-on into regulatory obstacles, yet might very well upend the mysterious world of virtual investing.

headline.main: A Venture Fund With Plenty of Virtual Capital, but No Capitalist
headline.print_headline: A Venture Fund With Capital, but No Capitalist

snippet: This collective digital-currency start-up runs head-on into regulatory obstacles, yet might very well upend the mysterious world of virtual investing.
